name: In Time for Christmas
description:
IN TIME FOR CHRISTMAS 

rpg | turn based combat

Leeroy Stubs has trained his whole youth to become Santa's Little Helper but when Santa's magical hat went missing, Christmas was canceled.

So, Leeroy did what he trained to do. He strapped on his little leather boots and set forth to a sleepy town. Will he save Christmas in time?


HOW TO PLAY
LMB mouse point and click movement
'F" to talk to NPC's and 'spacebar' to cycle through dialogue.
RMB opens and closes player Bio/Stats

*this game has obvious issues with it but given a few hiccups with the Win panel, you can make it through a few battles and find Santa's Hat*

Credits
Art & Code: cafeDraw
Music: Nolan Jameson
Additional Coding: kalestri

UI Graphics "Fantasy Wood GUI" byBlack Hammer via Unity Asset Store
VFX: Epic Toon FX by Archanor VFX via Unity Asset Store
